entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC fails in method containing await foreach #69805

Closed

  • Usings do not collapse in C# #69685
  • Error List does not present the correct URI for the displayed diagnostic ID from a Roslyn analyzer's helpLinkUri #68816
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
